item.title: Kubernetes Container Runtime Interface
item.description: Outline CRI-O Open Container Initiative (OCI) Container Runtime Interface (CRI) Kubernetes on CRI-O Trend OCI established in June 2015 Kubernetes 1.3 introduced rktnetes Kubernetes 1.5 introduced CRI Pre-CRI Docker integration was removed in Kubernetes 1.7 CRI-O 1.0.x released to match Kubernetes 1.7 Working kubelet to use CRI What is CRI-O OCI-based implementation of Kubernetes Container Runtime Interface http://cri-o.io/ OCI and CRI Open Container Inititive - A industrial standard for container - OCI established in June 2015 by Docker and other leaders in the container industry
